definitions: The act of catching one's foot on something and stumbling or falling.
The act of activating a mechanism, especially accidentally.
The act of experiencing the effects of a hallucinogenic drug.
The act of moving with light, quick steps.
examples: He was tripping over his own feet.
The alarm started tripping when the door opened.
They spent the night tripping on acid.
She was tripping lightly through the meadow.
